5A334C6A.Line1.7FA05: I can see how he would come to that conclusion. She is the Mother of Sanctuary, and she has sided with humanity in the past.

F427C5EC.Line3.7FA05: But his logic is flawed. To Lilith, humanity and this world are her possessions. Her dominion. And they always will be.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Elias summoned Lilith because he believes she is our only path to salvation.”
